text: Virgilio Barco Vargas (17 September 1921 - 20 May 1997) was a Colombian politician, and civil engineer and member of Colombian Liberal Party. He served as the 27th President of Colombia from 1986 to 1990. Vargas was born in Cúcuta, North Santander, Colombia. Vargas died in Bogotá, D.C., Colombia from cancer, aged 75. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1921 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Presidents of Colombia Category:Ambassadors of Colombia Category:Colombian engineers Category:Norte de Santander
title: Virgilio Barco Vargas
